channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump will nominate South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem for homeland security secretary
item.description: The two-term governor of South Dakota has been a loyal Trump ally. In her new role, Noem would oversee immigration, an issue Trump campaigned heavily on.
item.content:encoded:
The two-term governor of South Dakota has been a loyal Trump ally. In her new role, Noem would oversee immigration, an issue Trump campaigned heavily on.

(Image credit: Jeff Dean)
item.dc:creator: Jeongyoon Han

item.title: Trump taps Musk to lead a 'Department of Government Efficiency' with Ramaswamy
item.description: President-elect Trump announced a "Department of Government Efficiency," or DOGE, that will be led by Tesla CEO Elon Musk and entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy, focused on shrinking the federal government.
item.content:encoded:
President-elect Trump announced a "Department of Government Efficiency," or DOGE, that will be led by Tesla CEO Elon Musk and entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy, focused on shrinking the federal government.

(Image credit: Andrew Caballero-Reynolds and Alain Jocard)
item.dc:creator: Megan Pratz

item.title: Trump to nominate Fox News host Pete Hegseth to be defense secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has announced he will nominate Fox News host Pete Hegseth to serve as secretary of defense. Hegseth is a combat veteran who has long advocated for veterans.
item.content:encoded:
President-elect Donald Trump has announced he will nominate Fox News host Pete Hegseth to serve as secretary of defense. Hegseth is a combat veteran who has long advocated for veterans.

(Image credit: Terry Wyatt)
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: Trump names longtime election attorney Bill McGinley as his White House counsel
item.description: As White House Counsel, McGinley will be the point legal adviser for the president in regards to ethics, oversight and judicial nominations. He served as cabinet secretary during Trump's first term.
item.content:encoded:
As White House Counsel, McGinley will be the point legal adviser for the president in regards to ethics, oversight and judicial nominations. He served as cabinet secretary during Trump's first term.

(Image credit: Tom Williams)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo

item.title: Georgia counties certify the election, as fraud claims dissipate after Trump win
item.description: Every county in Georgia has certified its general election results. There had been concerns about election certification, but with Donald Trump's victory, those worries have largely gone away.
item.content:encoded:
Every county in Georgia has certified its general election results. There had been concerns about election certification, but with Donald Trump's victory, those worries have largely gone away.

(Image credit: Elijah Nouvelage)
item.dc:creator: Sam Gringlas

item.title: 'Orbital' by Samantha Harvey wins 2024 Booker Prize
item.description: Samantha Harvey has won the 2024 Booker Prize for her science fiction novel Orbital. The novel follows six international astronauts as they orbit the Earth for one day of their nine-month space mission.
item.content:encoded:
Samantha Harvey has won the 2024 Booker Prize for her science fiction novel Orbital. The novel follows six international astronauts as they orbit the Earth for one day of their nine-month space mission.

(Image credit: Henry Nicholls)
item.dc:creator: Dhanika Pineda

item.title: Pentagon secrets leaker Jack Teixeira is sentenced to 15 years in prison
item.description: A federal judge sentenced Jack Teixeira, a Massachusetts Air National Guard member, to prison after he pleaded guilty to leaking highly classified military documents about the war in Ukraine.
item.content:encoded:
A federal judge sentenced Jack Teixeira, a Massachusetts Air National Guard member, to prison after he pleaded guilty to leaking highly classified military documents about the war in Ukraine.

(Image credit: Margaret Small)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: A methane pollution fee on oil and gas faces a cloudy future under Trump
item.description: The Biden administration issued a new fee on climate-warming methane pollution, but the EPA regulation faces an uncertain future under President-elect Trump
item.content:encoded:
The Biden administration issued a new fee on climate-warming methane pollution, but the EPA regulation faces an uncertain future under President-elect Trump

(Image credit: Matthew Brown)
item.dc:creator: Jeff Brady

item.title: Here's who Trump has picked as cabinet members and key advisers
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is building his team, filling out cabinet and advisory roles with those considered to be fierce loyalists. Here's how his new administration is taking shape.
item.content:encoded:
President-elect Donald Trump is building his team, filling out cabinet and advisory roles with those considered to be fierce loyalists. Here's how his new administration is taking shape.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: NPR Washington Desk

item.title: Supreme Court refuses legal lifesaver for former Trump chief of staff
item.description: The Supreme Court dealt a major legal blow to former White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows on Tuesday, refusing to move the Georgia election interference charges against him to federal court.
item.content:encoded:
The Supreme Court dealt a major legal blow to former White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows on Tuesday, refusing to move the Georgia election interference charges against him to federal court.

(Image credit: Saul Loeb)
item.dc:creator: Nina Totenberg
